description:
For some time, Natsuno has suspected she is being watched. One day while she is out, someone breaks into Natsuno`s perfectly secure room and removes a single book.
It happens to be the book she just purchased at Sakura`s recommendation, the winner of the full-length novel special award, Heiando`s newest author Fujimaki Hotaru`s "Keisei Love Story."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Inu Nai Tokoro ni Kemuri wa Tatazu
There Is No Smoke Without Dog
犬無いところに煙は立たず
